channel.title: DOGE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in DOGE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A DOGE AI Tool Called SweetREX Is Coming to Slash US Government Regulation
item.description: Named for its developer, an undergrad who took leave from UChicago to become a DOGE affiliate, a new AI tool automates the review of federal regulations and flags rules it thinks can be eliminated.

item.title: A DOGE AI Tool Called SweetREX Is Coming to Slash US Government Regulation
item.description: Named for its developer, an undergrad who took leave from UChicago to become a DOGE affiliate, a new AI tool automates the review of federal regulations and flags rules it thinks can be eliminated.

item.title: Police Report: Edward ‘Big Balls’ Coristine Assaulted in Alleged Carjacking
item.description: President Donald Trump shared a photo of the DOGE staffer after the alleged attack and threatened to “federalize” Washington, DC. WIRED obtained the police report.

item.title: Police Report: Edward ‘Big Balls’ Coristine Assaulted in Alleged Carjacking

item.title: Photos: Here Are the Piles of Used Bedding and Children’s Play Sets Left Near DOGE’s Old Offices
item.description: Elon Musk’s DOGE minions have largely moved out of the General Services Administration. A dystopian scene of bedding and discarded kids’ toys remains.

item.title: Whistleblower scientists outline Trump’s plan to politicize and dismantle NSF
item.description: Trump gutting NSF will forfeit scientific leadership to China, letter of dissent says.

item.title: DOGE Put Free Tax Filing Tool on Chopping Block After One Meeting With Lobbyists
item.description: A key operative from DOGE initiated plans to potentially kill Direct File, the free tax filing tool developed by the IRS, after offering assurances it would be spared from cuts.

item.description: A key operative from DOGE initiated plans to potentially kill Direct File, the free tax filing tool developed by the IRS, after offering assurances it would be spared from cuts.

item.title: Here's What We Know About DOGE 2.0
item.description: DOGE has continued to operate in full force in its post-Elon iteration. Today on Uncanny Valley, we tell you everything you need to know about the agency.
